title: (2) T3 Walter Johnson Cards.   BOTH SOLD!
author: Archive

posts.post_title: (2) T3 Walter Johnson Cards.   BOTH SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Lance
I have 2 Walter Johnson T3's for sale or trade. All offers will be considered. These are very nice examples, but I will only guarantee them to be authentic. I do very little with T3's and would not want to place a numeric grade on either. I have included 800 dpi scans, so you experts should be able to get a pretty good feel. Please be sure to indicate which example or both you wish to make an offer. I accept all forms of payment, but if you choose to use paypal, I only ask for it to be an E-check. 

#1 This card has a crease or fold that appears to have been pressed in the field on the lower right. The back is extremely clean. I have included a scan of the field area in question.
[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/T3Johnson1001.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/T3Johnson1003.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/T3Johnson1002.jpg[/IMG]

#2 This card is probably more sound than the first. The corners are a little nicer, but the back has a water stain. The colors are not as viberant as the first, but it is an excellent collector's grade card.
[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/T3Johnson2004.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/T3Johnson2005.jpg[/IMG]
